SEARCH
Package database

Class CampDatabase

java.lang.Object
database.Database
database.CampDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
iDatabase
public class CampDatabase extends Database
Database class for handling camp-related data. Provides methods to interact with camp data such as retrieving and editing camp information.

      Returns:

    • getCampsByStaffInCharge

      public ArrayList<Camp> getCampsByStaffInCharge(int staffId)
      Retrieves a list of camps managed by a specific staff member.

      staffId - The unique ID of the staff member.
      Returns:

    • getCampsByUserFaculty

      public ArrayList<Camp> getCampsByUserFaculty(User user)
      Retrieves camps that are open to the faculty of a user or to NTU.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose faculty affiliation is to be considered.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Camp objects open to the user's faculty.

      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
